Plot: A mild-mannered guy, who is engaged to a monstrous woman, meets the woman of his dreams, and schemes to find a way to be with her.
Title: Norbit
Writer: Eddie Murphy (screenplay), Charlie Murphy (screenplay), Jay Scherick (screenplay), David Ronn (screenplay), Eddie Murphy (story), Charlie Murphy (story)
Actors: Eddie Murphy, Thandie Newton, Terry Crews, Clifton Powell
tomatoConsensus: Coming off his Oscar-nominated performance in Dreamgirls, the talented-but-inconsistent Eddie Murphy plays three roles in Norbit, a cruel, crass, stereotype-filled comedy that's more depressing than funny.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 8 wins & 8 nominations.
